Module RHI
Header /Engine/Source/Runtime/RHI/Public/RHIContext.h
Include #include "RHIContext.h"

Syntax

class IRHIComputeContext

Remarks

Context that is capable of doing Compute work. Can be async or compute on the gfx pipe.
